content: Absolutely love the new dashboard redesign! It's so much easier to navigate now and the loading times are incredibly fast. Great job team!
The app keeps crashing every time I try to upload a file larger than 10MB. This is really frustrating as I need to upload reports daily for my work.
Is there any way to export my data to CSV format? I couldn't find this option anywhere in the settings.
Just switched from a competitor and WOW the difference is night and day. Everything just works smoothly. Highly recommend!
The mobile app is basically unusable. Buttons are too small, text is cut off, and it drains my battery like crazy. Please fix this.
I've been a customer for 3 years and the service has been consistently excellent. The support team always responds within hours.
Getting error code 500 when trying to access my account settings. Tried different browsers but same issue persists.
The new pricing is outrageous. You've essentially doubled the cost while removing features. Very disappointed in this direction.
It would be great if you could add dark mode. I work late nights and the bright white interface is hard on my eyes.
Thank you for the quick resolution to my billing issue. Sarah from support was incredibly helpful and professional.
The two-factor authentication isn't working. I'm not receiving the SMS codes even though my phone number is correct.
Can you please add integration with Slack? Would make our team workflow so much better.
The product does what it says. Nothing special but nothing wrong either. Gets the job done.
I accidentally deleted important files and there's no way to recover them. You really need a trash/recycle bin feature!
Why did you remove the bulk edit feature? This was essential for my workflow and now I have to edit items one by one.
Best customer service I've ever experienced! They went above and beyond to help me migrate my data.
The search functionality is broken. It returns completely irrelevant results and sometimes doesn't find items I know exist.
Would love to see keyboard shortcuts added. Power users like me would really benefit from this.
The API rate limits are too restrictive for our use case. Is there an enterprise plan with higher limits?
Just discovered your product and I'm blown away by how intuitive it is. Didn't even need to read the docs!
Loading times have gotten progressively worse over the past few months. What used to take 2 seconds now takes 10+.
The onboarding tutorial was really helpful. Made it easy to get started without feeling overwhelmed.
I'm seeing duplicate entries appearing in my reports. This is causing major issues with our accounting.
Please add support for more languages. Many of my team members don't speak English fluently.
The collaboration features are fantastic! Being able to work on documents simultaneously with my team has transformed how we work.
Why is there no undo button?? I just made a change that I can't reverse and lost hours of work.
The notifications are way too aggressive. I'm getting emails for every tiny thing even though I tried adjusting settings.
Renewed my subscription for another year. Solid product that keeps getting better with each update.
It's fine I guess. Does what I need but the interface feels dated compared to alternatives.
The calendar sync feature is amazing! Finally all my schedules are in one place.
Images are not loading in the preview. Just showing broken image icons everywhere.
Would be perfect if you added a native Windows app instead of just the web version.
Your product literally saved my business. The automation features have freed up so much of my time.
Very unhappy with the recent update. You changed the entire layout and now I can't find anything.
How do I cancel my subscription? I've been looking for 20 minutes and can't find the option anywhere.
The free tier is surprisingly generous. Testing it out before committing to paid and impressed so far.
Please fix the memory leaks. After a few hours of use, the browser tab is consuming 2GB+ of RAM.
Just wanted to say the redesigned logo looks great! Small thing but shows you care about details.
The export feature keeps timing out for large datasets. Need this fixed urgently for a client deadline.
Integration with Google Drive would be a game changer. Please consider adding this!
Rock solid reliability. Haven't experienced a single outage in over a year of daily use.
The permission system is confusing. I can't figure out how to give view-only access to external partners.
Audio in video calls is choppy and keeps cutting out. Makes meetings very frustrating.
Switched my whole team over from [competitor]. Best decision we made this year!
Average product. Not bad but not great either. Might look at alternatives when our contract is up.
The analytics dashboard is incredibly insightful. Love being able to track everything in real-time.
Password reset emails are taking over 30 minutes to arrive. Had to reset twice and wait forever both times.
Can we please get an offline mode? I travel a lot and losing connectivity kills my productivity.
Documentation is excellent. Every question I had was answered in the help center.
Terrible experience trying to get a refund. Took 3 weeks and multiple emails to resolve.
